Summary._: [2] and [3] train service has resumed with delays following an earlier incident involving a train with mechanical problems at 145 St.

Summary._: [E][F][M][R] and [N]trains have delays and service changes because of ongoing signal problems at Queensboro Plaza. Details at mta.info

Description._: [E][F][M][R] and [N]trains have delays and service changes because of ongoing signal problems at Queensboro Plaza. Details at mta.info

LongDescription:
[F] trains are stopping along the [E] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to Queens Plaza, then on the [M] line to 47-50 Sts-Rockefeller Ctr in both directions.

[M] trains are stopping along the [F] line from Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av to 47-50 Sts-Rockefeller Ctr in both directions.

Expect delays on [E] [F] and [M] trains in both directions.

These service changes are because of ongoing signal problems at Queensboro Plaza.

Our crews are on the scene making repairs and we hope to resume regular service soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [A] No service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [A] No service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[A] No service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Rush Hours, 6 AM to 10 AM & 3:30 PM to 8 PM, Mon to Fri, until May 18

[A] trains that were scheduled to operate to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St will operate
to/from Euclid Av instead.

[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel.

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Beach 90 St, Beach 98 St, Beach 105 St and Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St,
transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Summary._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

Description._: Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection  [S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead [A] No rush hour service  to/from  Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

LongDescription:
Rockaways Long-Term Flood Protection
[S] No Rockaway Park Shuttle service at Broad Channel - Take the [A] instead
[A] No rush hour service to/from Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St

All times, until Friday May 18, 2018

[S] Rockaway Park Shuttle operates, approximately every 20 minutes, between
Rockaway Park-Beach 116 St and Beach 90 St and via the [A] to/from Far Rockaway-Mott Av.

For Broad Channel, take the [A], transfer to the [S] Rockaway Park Shuttle at Beach 67 St.

Alternate travel note for Broad Channel:
Q52-SBS, Q53-SBS, QM16 and QM17 service is also available at Cross Bay Blvd and Noel Rd.

Click here for additional details on this Flood Protection Project.
